original_text: “A sower went out to sow his seed. And as he sowed, some fell along the path and was trampled underfoot, and the birds of the air devoured it.
korean_text: 씨를 뿌리는 자가 그 씨를 뿌리러 나가서 뿌릴새 더러는 길 가에 떨어지매 밟히며 공중의 새들이 먹어버렸고

sentences.original_text: A sower went out to sow his seed.
sentences.korean_translation: 한 씨 뿌리는 자가 자기 씨를 뿌리러 나갔다.

sentences.original_text: and the birds of the air devoured it.
